title: we need one more lifesteal item.
body:
When I play tryndamere I literally don't know what to build for lifestealing, I eventually go with BotrK but its soooooooo expensive and doesn't really give what it should. nobody builds botrk now except vayne , tryndamere and yi. After the nerfs it is nearly useless right now.

The problem is with tryndamere for example, I cant buy death's dance. Cant buy hydra because I need attack speed not ad, cant buy BT because its useless on him, but I also don't want to build botrk.

really.

replies.body: "Lets not build our core items, then bitch on the forums because the resulting builds suck"

We could just buff Blade of the Ruined King.

Also, bloodthirster and even hydra are not useless on Tryndamere lol.

Ofcourse not but instead of bt why shouldnt I just build botrk?  Bt is good on some champs actually. Tryndamere literally doesn't need AD to deal damage. I tried all of them and the most useful öne was botrk but its too expensive. Hydra iş good but since tryndamere 1 shot enemy minions you dont need hydras passive.

> [{quoted}](name=Elros Thranduil,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vQQofzxJ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-03T02:52:40.339+0000)
>
> Ofcourse not but instead of bt why shouldnt I just build botrk? 

Because sometimes having more raw AD is better than an on-hit and attack speed.

> Bt is good on some champs actually.

Of course.

> Tryndamere literally doesn't need AD to deal damage.

Nonsense. While he does get some free AD from his Q, crit and attack speed are multiplicative stats. What do they multiply the effectiveness of? Your AD (and also on-hits in the case of attack speed).

Tryndamere doesn't tend to get as much AD as a Riven or Fiora, but he does need it.

> I tried all of them and the most useful öne was botrk but its too expensive. Hydra iş good but since tryndamere 1 shot enemy minions you dont need hydras passive.

You get bloodthirster if the enemy team doesn't really have a tank and you want to burst the enemy squishies down.

Assassin Tryndamere.

Just last week we had people complaining about how life steal is too strong and there isn't enough grevious wounds items out there.

Then we have this. 

For tryn, BOTRK is his primary source of LS. http://www.op.gg/champion/tryndamere/statistics/top

Its expensive, but it gives you a slow active to easily catch people in addition to a very smooth build path (everything you need is being built while working on the full item)
